summary: MY 2011 KIA SORENTO HAS 2 REAR PASSENGER DOORS THAT DON'T OPEN. NEITHER DOOR CAN BE OPENED FROM THE INSIDE AND THEY CAN BE OPENED FROM THE OUTSIDE APPROXIMATELY ONE INCH.  THE ONLY WAY TO "OPEN" THE DOOR IS BY PULLING EXTREMELY HARD ON THE OUTSIDE HANDLE (YOU CAN FEEL THE RESISTANCE OF THE INTERIOR PANEL).  THE DOOR DOES OPEN, BUT THE INTERIOR PANEL DETACHES FROM THE DOOR FRAME.  ONCE THE DOOR IS CLOSED AGAIN REVERTS TO NOT OPENING.
